snippet: Our summer intern, the college student Ben Murray, writes about an article in The Times that was important to him, pursuing questions about the topic from the original article to related Tumblr and Twitter posts, videos and more.
abstract: Our summer intern, the college student Ben Murray, writes about an article in The Times that was important to him, pursuing questions about the topic from the original article to related Tumblr and Twitter posts, videos and more.

headline.main: Guest Post | A Student Reader 'Figures Out Frank Ocean'
